ygData.subject: Re: Skill caps?
ygData.msgSnippet: The Hand to Hand cap is wrong.  My HTH is currently in the low 70 s at 23rd level. Rokenn Swiftsong Master Brewer of Societus Argenti Karana Server
ygData.messageBody:
The Hand to Hand cap is wrong. My HTH is currently in the low 70's at 23rd
level.

Rokenn Swiftsong
Master Brewer of Societus Argenti
Karana Server

>From: "Codo the Mysterious" <codo@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Skill caps?
>Date: Sat, 26 Jun 1999 14:34:51 -0500
>
>From: "Codo the Mysterious" <codo@...>
>
>The info I have says that Sneak caps at 75 for bards, and that Forage caps
>at 40....
>
>Here, let me post the caps I have info on...
>
>1H Blunt 200
>1H Slash 200
>Hand to Hand 40
>Piercing 200
>Sense Heading 200
>Singing 200
>Percussion 200
>String 200
>Dodge 125
>Brass 200

>
>Lulen
